backend/main.mo: Actor canister initializing access control and defining maps and types for users, posts, interactions, and media-related entities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing navigation changes, file impacts, related components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality and behavior of multiple frontend components and hooks.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file setting metadata, favicon, theme color, and mounting root for the frontend app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: Web app manifest defining app name, icons, colors, and standalone display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching strategy with versioned caches, navigation handling, asset caching, and update lifecycle events.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup with routing, providers, layout logic, and full-screen reel behavior on the root route.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard that verifies admin status and displays tabs for system tools like service status and storage cleanup.
frontend/src/components/AllInOneHub.tsx: Navigation hub showing cards that link to major app sections such as home, discover, messages, and marketplace.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedDeedsBar: Animated canvas-based progress bar that tracks session and daily usage, issuing warnings and timeouts.
frontend/src/components/BlogCard.tsx: Displays a blog post with author info, media tags, timestamps, and modal profile viewing.
frontend/src/components/BlogPage.tsx: Page that lists blogs, supports creating new posts, and shows skeletons or empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/components/ChallengesSectio: Challenge system UI with weekly challenges, join/share actions, leaderboards, and user badge displays.
Renders a comment input form and displays sorted comments with author info and timestamps, though comment creation is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/CreateBlogButton: Shows a button that opens the CreateBlogModal dialog for creating a new blog post.
Provides a form for creating a blog with text, categories, tags, media uploads, and live toggle, handling validation and submission via useCreateBlog.
frontend/src/components/CreateMarketplac: Modal for creating marketplace posts with fields for details, category, media upload, and post type, submitting through useCreateMarketplacePost.
frontend/src/components/CreatePostButton: Displays a styled button that opens the CreatePostModal to share a new post.
Form modal to create a post with caption, category, optional photo or video, media filters, and submission via useCreatePost.
frontend/src/components/DeedsBar.tsx: Visual timer bar showing session and daily usage with warnings, timeout triggers, and battery-style indicators.
frontend/src/components/DiscoverFeed.tsx: Displays a discover feed with filters for trending, videos, photos, and for-you posts, including video mode and horizontal scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/Feed.tsx: Shows the main feed with post filters, sorting by timestamp, video mode support, and a create-post option when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/FollowersModal.t: Modal listing a user's followers with profile previews and loading states.
frontend/src/components/FollowingModal.t: Modal showing accounts a user follows, including profile details and loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FriendsStatusFee: Fetches and displays recent status updates from followed users with timestamps and placeholders.
frontend/src/components/Gate.tsx: Landing page featuring search, trending blogs, user interaction, and various content sections like challenges and status feeds.
frontend/src/components/GradeDeedsRating: Displays a user's rating report card with mock rating data and allows friends to submit new ratings via a modal. Includes color-coded metrics, sliders, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the site header with logo navigation, language selector, messaging shortcut, and login/logout handling using Internet Identity. Manages authentication state and routing.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Provides a modal-based language picker with flag icons, updating the app's language context. Opens via a globe button and closes on selection.
frontend/src/components/LiveChatPanel.ts: Implements a live chat interface for a session with auto-scrolling, message sending, and user avatars. Fetches live comments and user profiles via queries.
frontend/src/components/LiveFeed.tsx: Shows active live sessions, allows starting a new live stream, and opens a viewer for selected sessions. Displays loading, empty state, and session cards with broadcaster info.
Displays a modal viewer for a live session with a simulated video preview and integrated live chat panel. Shows viewer count and closes through dialog controls.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login screen component that triggers Internet Identity login and displays promotional UI elements with loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/LogoShowcase.tsx: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Main marketplace view that fetches posts, filters and sorts them, and provides UI for creating new posts.
Card component displaying a single marketplace post with author info, category labels, timestamps, and basic save/message actions.
frontend/src/components/Messages.tsx: Messaging interface allowing users to select followed users and send text messages through backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/ModerationWarnin: Banner component showing a styled moderation warning with icon and alert styling.
frontend/src/components/NotificationsPan: Dialog panel displaying sorted notifications with timestamps and per-item mark-as-read actions.
frontend/src/components/PhotoTextReelCar: Displays a fullscreen reel-style post with blurred background, author info, photo, caption, category, and an action overlay.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Renders a feed-style post card with author details, category, media, reactions, and moderation warnings.
frontend/src/components/Profile.tsx: Implements the user profile page with posts, followers, notifications, profile editing, and session tracking.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial user profile setup including name, bio, and optional profile picture upload.
Provides spark, inspire, comment, and share reaction buttons with toast feedback and comment toggling.
frontend/src/components/ReelActionOverla: Floating action buttons for reel posts enabling spark, inspire, comment, and share interactions.
frontend/src/components/ReelBottomNav.ts: Deprecated bottom navigation bar for reel pages with buttons for main app sections and a create-post modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/ReelBottomTabNav: Enhanced bottom tab navigation with active states, labels, keyboard access, and a create-post modal.
frontend/src/components/ReelHome.tsx: Main reel feed displaying posts vertically with scroll snapping, authentication checks, and autoplay logic.
frontend/src/components/SafeImageIcon.ts: Image component that falls back to an icon or text when loading fails.
frontend/src/components/Search.tsx: Search bar component with input, submit button, and callback for performing searches.
frontend/src/components/SearchWithSi.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/ServiceStatusChe: Checks backend health status, displays results with icons and badges, and handles admin-only errors.
frontend/src/components/SiAssistant.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonBlog.tsx: Skeleton loading placeholder for a blog card layout.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonMarketpl: Skeleton loader representing a marketplace item card with images and metadata.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonPost.tsx: Skeleton loading UI for a standard post card with header, content, and actions.
frontend/src/components/Space.tsx: Static page describing a cosmic-themed UI with info cards about features and customization.
frontend/src/components/SpaceStarfield.t: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/SpaceThemeSettin: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/StarEffectLogo.t: Canvas-based animated star particle effect rendered around an image logo using rotating and twinkling particles.
frontend/src/components/StarlightBackgro: File is empty or contains no content.
frontend/src/components/StartLiveModal.t: Modal for starting and ending live video sessions with camera/audio controls and live chat panel integration.
frontend/src/components/StartupRecoveryS: Recovery screen that explains cache issues and triggers a full app cache clear and reload.
frontend/src/components/StorageCleanup.t: Interface for running health checks and deep cleanup of blob storage with progress tracking and status reporting.
frontend/src/components/TalkToMeBar.tsx: File is empty or contains no content.
frontend/src/components/TopLevelErrorBou: Error boundary that catches top-level app errors and displays a reload prompt with error details.
Sidebar showing trending hashtags and top users derived from recent posts.
frontend/src/components/UpdateAvailableB: Banner component that prompts users to apply updates or perform a full cache recovery, handling blocked reloads and update progress state.
frontend/src/components/UpdateStatusModa: Modal for updating a user's status text, image, and optional music attachment with upload handling and validation.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileModal: Modal displaying another user's profile, posts, and follow stats, with loading states and optional follow action placeholder.
frontend/src/components/VideoModeReel.ts: Full‑screen vertical reel viewer that scroll-snaps through posts and activates the current video based on scroll position.
frontend/src/components/VideoReelCard.ts: Card for displaying a single video post with auto-play, mute controls, author info, timestamps, and moderation warnings.
frontend/src/components/WeatherBackgroun: Canvas-based animated weather background rendering rain or snow particles with adaptive gradients based on weather and time.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a language context with translation dictionaries and a hook to access and change the current UI language.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHorizontalWheelScr: Converts vertical mouse wheel movement into horizontal scrolling for a referenced element unless interacting with clickable elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and identity persistence via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, albums, statuses, music attachments, and related backend data.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerUpdat: Detects service worker updates, handles stale caches, and controls when to activate updates or reload with a reload guard.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpaceTheme.ts: Empty placeholder hook with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeather.ts: Fetches weather and sun cycle data using geolocation and OpenMeteo, with fallbacks and periodic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useWheelScroller.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, and custom utility classes for scrolling, shadows, and bottom navigation UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with react-query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/swRecovery.ts: Implements functions to clear caches, unregister service workers, manage cooldowns, and perform full client-side recovery flows.
frontend/src/utils/swReloadGuard.ts: Tracks and limits service‑worker‑triggered reloads using sessionStorage to prevent reload loops.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color variables, container settings, and plugins like typography and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, including requirements to replace wheel navigation with a new mechanic and track feature requests.
